channel.title: Using cheat engine it is possible to hack neopets games still
channel.description: Although they don't use the times the number by 8 method anymore...It is hard and does require a lot of math and the use of cheat engines hotkey setup helps al ot but if you look up destruct o match II's leader scy10_20 thats me and I got that score on lvl 2 of the game ;) I will probably post a tutorial later but since everyone thinks its impossible to hack neopets games anymore I figured I would try and it was a success. Although I hate neopets and this was the first time I logged on in about 2 years XD.
